validatePassword(String) - Static method in class control.AuthenticationService.Utility
Validates a password based on specific rules.
validatePassword(String) - Static method in class hms.Utility
Validates a password based on the following criteria: - At least one uppercase letter - At least one lowercase letter - At least one digit - At least one special character - Minimum length of 8 characters
